price: 69 Nous dîmes alors au bûcher : « Sois pour Abraham d’une fraîcheur inoffensive. »
arabic: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qul'nā yānāru kūnī bardan wasalāman ʿalā ib'rāhīma
